Html:
Hi RadioMan,

This is really a great & huge work !!

I've a question I noticed in info tab "Disk Cache limit " is 256 MB ?

I searched the code but didn't know where to change it ,
or I miss understood and the application will expand beyond 256 MB for disk cache ?
There is 2TB limit for cache, file space is preallocated ahead for speed and expands if needed.
